summary: This module contains unit tests for the GitLab OAuth authenticator, providing mocked HTTP responses and helper utilities to simulate GitLab API interactions. The tests validate handling of API version detection, allowed groups and project IDs, configuration deprecation warnings, and user data mapping.
business_intent: Verify that the GitLab OAuth integration correctly interprets GitLab API responses, enforces access restrictions based on groups and projects, respects configuration settings, and maintains compatibility with different API versions.
